cleaned_text: Each day we are confronted with mental and emotional struggles that can have a lasting impact on our health. We may feel overwhelmed, undervalued, and anxious or stressed out as life throws us curveballs in the form of job loss, financial strains or personal relationships. In these challenging times, it's important to do whatever we can to take care of ourselves mentally and emotionally so that we don't fall into bad habits. Fortunately there is an ancient practice you can use to help improve your overall mental health: yoga and meditation. Increase Your Awareness of Physical Sensations With the hectic pace of our everyday lives, it can be easy to forget to take a moment and pay attention to what's happening in our bodies. Fortunately, yoga and meditation in [wellness care centre](https://www.nirvananaturopathy.com/) can help us get back into sync with ourselves—bringing awareness back to the sensations that are often overlooked until they start causing pain or discomfort. Reduce Overall Stress Levels As one of the oldest holistic healing practices, Yoga has been used for centuries to enhance physical health, curb emotions and relax the mind. Meditation on the other hand helps us attain a mental stillness so that the inner wisdom can be heard more clearly. Together these two powerful tools promote balance in our lives physically, mentally and emotionally — leading to a decrease in overall stress levels. Calm You Down When Anxious or Stressed Out Yoga and meditation in [wellness retreats near Mumbai](https://www.nirvananaturopathy.com/contact) are terrific tools to help you manage the effects of stress, worry and anxiety in our lives. With a little bit of time and effort, breathing exercises, poses, mantras and mindfulness can help us restore balance when feeling overwhelmed or afraid. Whether completely new to yoga or an experienced yogi, it is easy to find activities that will relax your mind and soul so you can move on from crises large or small. Ease Depression Symptoms If you are feeling a bit down or overwhelmed with life as of late, then you may be wondering about ways to help ease your depression symptoms effectively. Exercise such as yoga and meditation has been proven through science that it can genuinely improve your mood and help you cope better with stress. These practices have become particularly popular in recent times, with numerous research studies demonstrating their positive effects on individuals struggling from mental health issues like anxiety and depression. Improve Memory & Focus Reduce Overall Stress Levels Yoga and meditation are both known to be great tools for developing a healthier mental state. Practicing these techniques in [wellness resort Pune](https://www.nirvananaturopathy.com/contact) will help increase self-awareness, decrease stress levels, reduce anxiety, and cultivate better emotions. Whether you use it as part of therapy or just to improve yourself in general, the benefits of yoga and meditation are virtually limitless. With its ability to help us gain insight into ourselves, remove the burdens of our daily lives, become aware of our thoughts and feelings, and ultimately create healthier relationships with those around us, yoga and meditation have formed an indispensible part of many people's lives around the world. Ultimately though, it comes down to your decision whether or not you will commit yourself to incorporating yoga and meditation regularly. The profound effects that it is known to have make it well worth considering for anyone looking for a way to improve their mental health greatly.
